ModMetadata.Name: Difficulty Starting Conditions
ModMetadata.Author: X_Blaster
ModMetadata.Description:
Starting Conditions enabled Difficulty --- WARNING: This mod will not work unless you install [url=https://github.com/BepInEx/BepInEx/releases/tag/v5.4.21]BepInEx 5.x[/url]. Instructions to install BepInEx [url=https://github.com/ICanHazCode/Stationeers.BepInEx#bepinex-install-instructions]Stationeers.BepInEx[/url] --- This mod allows custom difficulty settings to use customized (non-Default) StartingConditions.
If the selected world has it's own starting conditions, this mod will ask you which set you want to use.
